arStrings.szText: Weapon Mastery Skill: Thrust your weapon into open wounds on the enemy, dealing heavy damage if it is bleeding.

{if:SF_14}{icon:bullet, 1.2} Charge Cooldown: {icon:arrow, 1.2} {c_number}{Recharge Time}{/c} seconds.
{else}{icon:bullet, 1.2} Cooldown: {icon:arrow, 1.2} {c_number}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds.{/if}

Ripping your weapon out of enemies during {c_important}Rupture{/c} causes an explosion that deals {c_number}{dot:EXPLOSION_BLEEDING}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{SF_19}{/c} seconds. This damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_33} * 100|%x|]{/c} for every {c_number}{SF_32}{/c} Strength you have.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[{SF_34} * 100|%x|]{/c}
Hitting at least {c_number}1{/c} enemy with {c_important}Rupture{/c} Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_21}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_21]){/c}.
Hitting enemies with {c_important}Rupture{/c} increases your Attack Speed by {c_number}[{SF_23} * 100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:ATTACK_SPEED}{/c} seconds.
